critique: The document pertains to an amendment regarding the employment of youth on projects under the National Youth Administration and the Works Progress Administration during the Emergency Relief Appropriation Acts of 1935 and 1936. It focuses on setting the conditions of employment, hours of work, and monthly earnings for young persons eligible for benefits under these programs. The amendment ensures that part-time employment earnings do not exceed 50% of the schedule outlined in Executive Order No. 7046.
